name: The Poor Man and his Dog
name_original: The Poor Man and his Dog
description:
Play as a homeless man where all he wants to to be able to have a home, where he himself and his pet dog can  stay in.

Gameplay

Beg for money by clicking on the people passing by but be cautious as some are after your money and might not be pleased if you cant pay then.

spend your money on the three buildings behind you. one is for health, one is for protection and one is to end the game.

good luck and have fun
